eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Note, Polygon, Rectangle, Text

    public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Shape is the parent class of all shapes and provides methods to add and delete a shape at the given location.
